title: strings.Title() not working correctly
body:
by **edin.dazdarevic**: 
As per my understanding of title case the following string "edIN" when
converted to title case should be "Edin".

But when I run strings.Title("edIN"), I get "EdIN" as the result. 

Here is the code:

http://play.golang.org/p/Tdppckkrer

What I am missing here?
